name: The Rocket Facility
description:
What is It

The Rocket Facility is a simple linear level that was designed for a FPS game. The level features basic patrolling characters that can be defeated when shot, a puzzle in the facility's Rocket Room, and uses high resolution assets from the creators listed below.

More Information

This level received various iterations upon different sections of the level in order to better suit the gameplay and help with the flow of the level. Changes, iterations, and explanations behind the design of the level can be found here.

Controls

The game features Keyboard + Mouse controls.

Credits

Design + Scripting - Raven Powless

Unreal Asset Packs

Bunker - Starlight Arts

Construction Site VOL. 1 - Supply and Material Props - Dekogon Studios

Construction Site VOL. 2 - Tools, Parts, and Machine Props - Dekogon Studios

Free Furniture Pack - Next Level 3D

Industry Props Pack 6 - SilverTM

Modular Industrial Area - Next Level 3D

Office Scene - Jaime Perez

Underground Subway - SO.Art
